评论详情: I love it! Really good quality. I will order it in a another color but will defiantly size down one size.
Loved it

I ordered a size medium in Nutmeg.  The color is great, but the fit is much bigger than expected.  I normally wear a medium, but I could definitely could have gone better with a size small.  I do like the oversized fit, but the medium is far too big.  I can't return it since it was a gift.

This is one of the better sweater choices on Amazon. Good material that’s not cheap or thin. Washed well (cold, hang dry). Didn’t smell bad when opened. XS was still a bit too oversized for my liking (5’2”, 110 lbs) so I put in dryer to shrink a bit. Perf. Got wine red - more burgundy towards brown than a nice wine red really. Wish I’d gotten a different color.
Love the color, very comfy. It's a very thick nice quality.
This is a wonderful medium weight sweater. I usually wear a large but read the reviews and went down a size to a medium. It's still oversized but still perfect. I'm buying another one. 5'10, 190lbs

Nice dupe of a sweater—it’s got a slight sheen to it, and it drapes well and is a nice heavy weight knit. Will show some wear after a while, washes well on gentle in a delicates bag. Real deal looks less synthetic than this, but I like it!
Soft and exceeded my expectations on quality. Runs a little large but Love it.

This is my new favorite sweater! The material is so warm and soft - this feels like a high quality sweater. I’ve washed it a few times and it still looks brand new. I have also put the sweater in the dryer and it has not shrunk. This is perfect for tall girlies too - I am 5’11 and the arms are long enough for me! This sweater is a must for fall/winter fashion!
The sweater is nice in size and warm. It has a little weight which helps with the warmth. Will need an under shirt or risk air/wind coming in from the bottom as it is not tight fitting at the bottom.
I love this sweater and have purchased 2. They came out of the wash perfectly fine, and I haven’t experienced any pilling. I can’t say enough, I love them!

I got this to wear with leggings and it falls a little short in the front I feel. It’s ok and still presentable but if you’re taller and like to leave something to the imagination or will be self conscious about it, might want to check the length and size up. Sweater itself is actually really well made, durable material and easy to wash.
Awesome
I have purchased several of these sweaters in different colors and I will definitely be ordering more! They are so comfortable and the fit is perfect!

I ordered this but think I received the wrong color, mine looked more like apricot/white, wasn’t a dark nutmeg however, it was a quality fabric and great length for leggings! I ordered a large but sent back for a XL. Do love an oversized sweatshirt.

I’m shocked by the quality! It’s really great! It’s got some weight to it, it’s silky soft, a good oversized look without being gigantic. I already bought it in 2 colors but will definitely be buying more!
Nice quality. Great fit

I now own this sweater in 4 colors (red, colorblock pink, nutmeg, black/white stripe).  Love all 4 colors. I love the length of it.  Just long enough to wear with leggings but can also go with certain jeans.  It's a nice warm sweater but not overly hot.  The fit is perfectly oversized without looking frumpy. These are a winter wardrobe staple.
Love the material and the fit - comfortable & looks good/flattering. Will get another color!
This is a go-to sweater for me. It is the perfect thickness and softness. Can be dressed up or down depending on what you’re going for. The black was perfect. Held up well to travel and washing.

I ended up ordering 2 and gifting the other. These are in my experience at least 2 sizes big. They are extremely stretchy so size down. I could probably even could comfortably gone down another size. For reference I’m 195 lb not busty but curvy and med would have fit. I never wear mediums.
I always get compliments on these sweaters. I have several different colors. They are so comfortable and great for leggings!
Absolutely love the look I was going for! Oversized with leggings and boots material is also perfect
Loved this sweater! The cut and length is perfect to wear with leggings or jeans. Doesn’t snag! Is a heavier/stretchy material so lays really nice.
A bit bulky but I love the color and find myself wearing it often.
Excellent quality fits as expected, I would buy again in another color,  really pleased

I have this sweater in two different colors in two different sizes. I ordered a XL (my true to size) and XXL. I am 5ft 5in and 220lbs. I did read some reviews to order a size down cause its over sized but I like an oversized look on me to begin with. After getting them and trying them on I will say is if you want a true to size look but somewhat oversized go with your regular size. If you want an oversize look to cover your butt a little and wear with leggings or just like that look maybe go one size up. The quality is nice. I’ve washed them both plenty of times but I do hang dry them and they still look new still. They are a nice thickness but not too heavy.

These Are SOO comfy, and I wish I could wear them year round.  I get so many compliments on them.  Wil buy more, if the mood strikes!!!
Beautiful sweater! Great quality as well, and WARM. Runs true to size.
I love this sweater it’s so cute, and the sizing is perfect!

评论概述: The sweater is comfortable and stylish. I should have gotten a medium which I’m going to buy.

评论详情: So soft. Perfect sweater. Not too thin, but not too heavy. Get tons of compliments. Sizing is perfect. I sized up for a more oversized fit. Worth it.
It fits a little big and I honestly could’ve sized down. It’s super thick and soft. I’m surprised by how good the quality is. And it’s super cute!!
I like the sweater

I bought this to wear on New Year’s Eve very last minute, when I found out everyone had to wear something white and I didn’t have anything white to wear, so not only did it arrive on time, it was perfect and ready to wear. Super soft and a great quality. My favorite sweater now.

This sweater is super comfy and cute! However sadly I only wore it a couple of times and barely nicked it and it caught a few pretty big snags :/. One was just off of a counter corner. Wondering if it’s with the thread because this has never happened to any other sweater I’ve owned.

This sweater is exactly as described! The feel of the knit is nice, not itchy (haven't washed it yet so dont know about piling)...I like that it has the exposed seems as it gives the sweater a little bit of interest. I got the nutmeg color and it is exactly as pictured. The measurements were spot-on... I am 5ft 2in, 160lbs with a smaller frame in my upper body and I went with the small. I am happy with the way it fits although I do think I might try an XS with my next one just to check it out... yes, I plan on buying quite a few more colors in this. It's light weight but warm enough that I can wear it under a jacket or by itself. Very happy with the fit, construction, style, quality and price of this item!!!!
This sweater was very boxy and did not fit as expected. I ended up returning because of how boxy it made me look.
This sweater is comfy and cute, but it starting pilling and snagging after wearing it only 2 times. For the price, it should be better quality. Would not recommend.
Great quality! Looks like the picture

评论概述: It’s not sewn wrong—actually look at the listing
评论详情: Beautiful sweater!! Have seen several people post sweater is sewn inside out and had to return….That is literally the description. It looks beautiful. I have had this sweater since 2023, have worn it often, and still love it. Does slowly start to pill like sweaters can do over time…my fault for washing it with my regular clothes. I will wash my next one inside out on the gentle cycle separately to see if this helps prevent this. Love oversized look. Super comfortable yet stylish. Ordering again!!!
Some reviews mentioned this but I took a chance and purchased anyways, looks like the material will fall apart at the seams, not put together well.
Absolutely love this sweater. It is beautiful and great quality.
I love long sleeves and these are nice and long AND tight so they stay.  It’s a great loose fit, very comfortable and warm.

Love this!!! Very soft, the material is of great quality, can dress up or down. I wear a large and sometimes have to order a XL in clothes like this on Amazon, but this fits to size and glad I ordered what I would normally wear. Would purchase again!!
Love the color and the way it fits!
So comfortable and cute! The quality feels better than I expected
Love the blue and white
Surprisingly great quality sweater. Good fit too. I already have 2 colors and am planning on getting more.
I treated myself to a winter wardrobe for the holidays and so, happy to have found this top that I can wear beyond this season!  Versatile!
My wife got this sweater as a gift. The quality is bad. The attached photos show how bad the quality is. We will not buy this brand again.
Super comfy oversized sweater

This sweater is so warm and comfortable! It is perfect thickness without being too over powering. It does fit oversized so I would recommend sizing down. I have washed it many times, and it has not faded or shrunk.

评论概述: 4”10 and 145lbs Medium but size down to Small
评论详情: The sweater is cute and I ordered it in a medium, pretty big, I recommend sizing down to small for a cute fit if you’re pairing it with a skirt.
Love this sweater. The color is perfect. It’s so soft and stylish. Bought 3 more in different colors.

The style is super cute! I got a large to have a little extra room, the material is super soft and thick and snag resistant. The only thing, is that I bought the red one thinking the picture would be true to color and it was not. The red is bright red and not the darker warm color. Still a beautiful sweater just deceiving on the color!
Probably giving this to charity. The seams are half turned inside out on it. It just looks weird. Color and material are fine otherwise.
Ordered this sweater and I love it!!
This sweater is so beautiful! Fits perfectly and feels so soft and comfortable. Perfect thickness and not see through at all.
Looks amazing, feels amazing, fits amazing, amazing price so the only thing left for you to do is to buy it now.
The fabric is soft and heavier than I expected. Great buy!

I usually wear a size medium but I thought that a smaller size would fit better overall because I am only 5 feet tall and I have a short torso.  And I was right!The color is between a dark beige and a 'lighter' brown.  It has a very nice deep color (although a little bit bland by itself) and the fabric is soft and flattering.  The feature I liked the most were the sleeves.  The cuffs are longer so it makes the sleeves puff out just a little bit more so that detail is very nice.  Since I did order a smaller size, the fit on me was better: not too long and not too short and the details of being oversized is not lost on me.  You can still tell the shape of the sweater but I am not swallowed up by the sweater.  This sweater can be dressed up with a nice pair of slacks and shoes/boots or dressed down in a more casual look with jeans or leggings.  Overall, I like the sweater and would order another one in a more vibrant color (just to compare).

My mother in law bought me this sweater for my bday and while I love the sweater as a whole the seems are on the outside and it looks wierd to me. If you flip it out the tags on the outside so you have no choice sadly. But other reviews don’t seem to mind. Maybe it’s just me lol
Product was high quality and a very nice fit. It has an oversized fit. Very comfy.
Great fit & cute
Sooo comfy and oversized. This is definitely my favorite sweater and it looks so classy too!
The sweater was sealed into the lining of the bag and I could not save it
I love this top!

Loved this sweater - it is oversized so you might have to size down. I went with a small and it still is more oversized than I need. It’s flattering and warm. I’ve work a few times and washed on delicate and the quality hasn’t lessened at all.
I thought the sleeves would be longer but they were super short.. and i was a litle bit itchy. I would defiantly size up when ordering this sweater!
I’ve bought three of these in different colors. Love the oversized sweater look. True to size. Size down if u don’t want the more comfy look.
Bought for a casual look at work on Friday’s. Love how it fits, looks on and perfect weight.
Great sweater, soft breathable and keeps its shape.

I ordered 4 of these and every single one of them has the seams sewn on the outside.  At first, I thought that was the design; however, I recently asked a seamstress friend and she said, nope, the seams are backwards with the outside material on the inside and the inside material on the outside with seams shown with the outside part and the tags all with the outside material and so yeah.  I’m not sure what that’s about.  Otherwise, the sweaters are beautiful, the material is soft, and hold its shape relatively well.  Just weird to be sewn all backwards.
I have this sweater in multiple colors however this red one isn't like the picture. its more of a christmas bright red versus the cranberry color as in the picture.
Bought an XL. Fit is oversized as described, I comfortably wear it with leggings. Washed and air dried without issue. Soft and warm. Would buy again.

I liked the thickness of the fabric but it was just too short. I'm 6 feet tall, 195 pounds and 5 months pregnant. If it were just 3-5 inches longer this would have been my new favorite top.
Greta product, true to size, is oversized, warm, good color, washable
Very oversized & large. Thick stretchy material. Extremely comfy
I bought this sweater because of the lovely deep purple color, which it is not. This sweater is burgundy red

I wanted a nice, big, comfy sweater since I have gained a lot of weight from baby / postpartum. This is so comfortable and flattering. Nice quality. I'm about 216 lbs, 5'3" (with most of my weight around my belly) and Ig ot the XL and I'm happy with how oversized it is.

The sweater is a pretty color but the fit made me look totally boxy and was very unflattering. I ordered my normal size. It also wasn’t as long as expected. I wanted to love it but will be returning it.
This sweater is very comfortable and great quality.

评论概述: Loved it on the first wear but after the first wash it came out with a ton of dark spots
评论详情: I loved the sweater on the first wear (no, I didn't wash it first). The sleeves are fun and the fit is perfectly oversized. But when I washed it (per the instructions) it ended up with a ton of dark spots, as if the black from the stripes bled to the white spots. Unfortunately it's now ruined and I'm so sad!

This sweater is thick and feels like very good quality. It has a slickness to it that avoids wrinkling and lays nicely. I am 5’6, 170lbs, 34/36D and carry more weight on my hips so I went with a medium and it was perfect. I am normally a large or XL in sweaters and even the medium still gives an “oversized” fit. I will definitely be ordering more!
Great quality sweater! Very thick & comfortable. True to size.
This sweater is cute & comfortable but is very oversized!
This sweater is super comfy and soft but I wore for a couple hours and the strap of my purse made the sweater pill. Easily comes off with a shaver but still

This sweater is BEAUTIFUL and the fabric is very nice and soft. It is True to size. All the tags were sewn to the outside of the garment and the cuffs sewn on inside out. I took the tags off and have decided to ignore the cuffs.

This sweater is so comfortable and soft. I ordered up for a more oversized fit and I love it. It washed up perfectly. It has a heavy thick feel to it. Great quality for the price. I would definitely buy more.

I purchased this now that the weather is getting colder. I love the look - It is definitely oversized. It is a little on the wide side (was hoping it was just an inch longer) it looks really boxy when you get it out the packaging but once you have it on it looks a lot better. The material is great!
This sweater has great weight to it and is comfortable. The fabric has almost a cooling feel to it so you don’t get too hot. Dress up or down. Fab.
